name: Aliens Love Humans
description:
Try to guess Alien's Love expectations to gain currency.

You have 4 different Aliens with there own mood and love expectations.
If the alien's eyes look in certain direction give them exactly what they say that they want.
If the alien's eyes look in another direction give them something different from what they said.
You have to figure out what whenever they say what they really want or not.

Tools used :
- Renpy
- Atom
- Piskel
- Gimp
- BeepBox https://beepbox.co
